allow_upscaling.description: Allow an image to be scaled to larger than its actual width.

alt.description: Optional. Value of the alt attribute.

aspect_ratio.description: Optional. Aspect ratio for the image to conform to. Can be a float ("0.6667"), a ratio ("16 / 9"), or a predfined ratio ("square").

fallback_src.description: Optional. URL for the image source if "src" is not set.

picture_sources.description: Optional. Array of sources for the <picture> tag.

src.description: Optional. URL for the image source.

photon_transformations.description: A set of Photon API transformations in the order they should be performed
